| **Job Title** | Systems Co-ordinator | **Department:** | Administration |
| **Incumbent** |  | **Reports to:** | Director |
| **Date** |  |  |  |

Position Overview

* Assume overall Office/Admin support.

Essential Job Functions

* Reception
* Procurement of Consumables
* Updating of Employees Files
* Updating of Customer List
* Control of “Blade Register”
* Drop off/pick up Machine Blades for external sharpening
* Pest Control
* Overview of Change Rooms/Canteen
* Answer and directing incoming calls/take messages
* Dispatches via Courier/Email waybill numbers to Customer
* Data capture of NCA’s/Job Cards/Customer Complaints
* In charge of Contract Cleaner
* Customer Filing
* BRCGS involvement
* Glass & Brittle plastic Register
* Pouch Samples Admin/Dispatching samples to Customers
* Laundry
* Post
* Maintenance of First Aid Box

Requirements:

* Matric/Or equivalent
* Previous admin experience essential

Other Skills/Abilities

* Good interpersonal skills
* Computer literacy

Employee Manager

NOTE: This job description is not intended to be all-inclusive. Employee may perform other related duties as negotiated to meet the ongoing needs of the organization.
